TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemoteTypeContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

summary.span: 定义一个协定，组件可使用该协定跨应用程序域和进程边界访问类型信息和调用成员。

span.span: Defines a contract that components can use to access type information and invoke members across application domain and process boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取 ，组件可以调用 实现接口的对象的方法 。To get an , components can call the method of an object that implements the interface. 若要获取有关对象的类型的信息，组件将调用 方法。To get information about the type of an object, components call the method. 若要获取有关对象成员的信息，组件需要调用返回特定类型成员相关信息的方法之一。To get information about the members of an object, components call one of the methods that returns information about a particular kind of member. 例如，若要获取有关对象的事件的信息，组件可以使用 或 方法。For example, to get information about the events of an object, components can use the or method. 若要调用对象的成员，组件需要使用 方法。To invoke a member of an object, components use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetCanonicalName ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCanonicalName() cil managed
Public Function GetCanonicalName () As String
public: System::String ^ GetCanonicalName();
abstract member GetCanonicalName : unit -> string

summary.span: 返回当前 的规范名称。

span.span: Returns the canonical name of the current .
The canonical name of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 规范名称是全局唯一名称，如完全限定的类型名称。The canonical name is a globally unique name, such as a fully qualified type name. \<*assembly name*> \<*fully qualified type name*> 对于托管类型，建议使用格式的字符串。Strings in the format \<*assembly name*>, \<*fully qualified type name*> are recommended for managed types. \<*type library name*> \<*type name*> 对于 COM 类型，建议使用格式的字符串。Strings in the format \<*type library name*>, \<*type name*> are recommended for COM types. 发布类型后，请不要更改类型的规范名称。Do not change the canonical name for a type after the type is published. 更改组件的未来版本中类型的规范名称会破坏组件与已使用该类型的客户端之间的兼容性。Changing the canonical name for a type in a future version of a component breaks compatibility between the component and clients that are already using the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 规范名称是全局唯一名称，如 GUID。A canonical name is a globally unique name, such as a GUID. \<*assembly name*> \<*fully qualified type name*> 对于托管类型，建议使用格式的字符串。Strings in the format \<*assembly name*>, \<*fully qualified type name*> are recommended for managed types. \<*type library name*> \<*type name*> 对于 COM 类型，建议使用格式的字符串。Strings in the format \<*type library name*>, \<*type name*> are recommended for COM types. 发布类型后，请不要更改类型的规范名称。Do not change the canonical name for a type after the type is published. 更改组件的未来版本中类型的规范名称会破坏组件与已使用该类型的客户端之间的兼容性。Changing the canonical name for a type in a future version of a component breaks compatibility between the component and clients that are already using the type.

MemberSignature.Usage: iRemoteTypeContract.InvokeMember (name, bindingFlags, target, remoteArgs, remoteArgModifiers, localeId)

param.name: name
param.span: 要调用的成员的名称。

span.span: The name of the member to invoke.

param.name: bindingFlags
param.span: 值的一个按位组合，用于指定搜索成员的方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that specifies how to search for the member.

param.name: target
param.span: 要在其上调用指定成员的 。

span.span: The on which to invoke the specified member.

param.name: remoteArgs
param.span: 一个 ，其中包含传递给将调用的成员的参数。

span.span: An that contains the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.

param.name: remoteArgModifiers
param.span: 一个布尔值的数组，这些布尔值指示是否通过引用传递每个 值。

span.span: An array of Boolean values that indicate whether each of the values is passed by reference.

param.name: localeId
param.span: 用于区域设置特定的转换的区域设置 ID，这类转换可由所调用的成员执行。

span.span: A locale ID to use for locale-specific conversions that might be performed by the member being invoked.

summary.span: 调用当前 的指定成员。

span.span: Invokes the specified member of the current .

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示被调用成员的返回值。

span.span: A that represents the return value of the invoked member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `remoteArgModifiers`参数仅用于使用 COM 编写的组件。The `remoteArgModifiers` parameter is used only for components that are written using COM. 参数中的每个值 `remoteArgModifiers` 指示参数中的相应值是否 `remoteArgs` 通过引用传递。Each value in the `remoteArgModifiers` parameter indicates whether the corresponding value in the `remoteArgs` parameter is passed by reference. 的长度应与的 `remoteArgModifiers` 长度相同 `remoteArgs` 。The length of `remoteArgModifiers` should be the same as the length of `remoteArgs`. 如果传递 `null` for `remoteArgModifiers` ，则此方法使用默认逻辑来确定参数是否由引用传递。If you pass `null` for `remoteArgModifiers`, this method uses default logic to determine whether an argument is passed by reference.
